segments.text: I see a boy near the center, attempting to reach something in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out, and it appears to be tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself, with one hand already in a jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands below him, reaching up with an open palm, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission, completely unaware of the dangers around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a bold move, especially with the adult right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re risking such a fall just for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of that stool tipping over makes my stomach churn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess it will be if he tumbles onto that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene here.
segments.speaker: PAR
